version_description:
Enjoying the powder this winter? We hope so!
Just two minor updates:
- We won’t constantly bug you if location services are turned off
- Added a 200 mile filter for LiveSnow (helpful for SF / Tahoe folks)

- Added the current night's forecast. Previously, this time period just disappeared. Oops!
- Added 6-10 day forecasts (available to paying subscribers).
- Added description showing the elevation of the snow/temperature forecast.
- Added ability to choose between metric & imperial units. Oh, Canada!
Bug fixes and improvements

- Timestamps and dates now in your local time
- Bug fixes

- Fixed bug that affected some Facebook users
+ Minor performance improvements

-Fixed issue related to creating password at signup
-Fixed issue related to searching mountains
Minor Bug Fixes
Minor Bug Fixes

We spent our summer and early fall sprucing up the app! In this release:

- Transitioned to a bottom navigation bar so that you don't have to hunt for information.
- Adjusted the placement of our advertisements so that they are visible but don't interfere.
- Fixed a few other odds and ends.

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com. We usually respond within one day (sometimes much sooner!). 

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

Winter is ramping up across the Northern Hemisphere! In this release:

- Enabled social sharing across all pages.
- Continued to adjust the placement of our advertisements so that they are visible but don't interfere.
- Timestamp for all snow reports.
- Fixed a few other odds and ends. 

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com. We usually respond within one day (sometimes much sooner!).

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!
We’ve updated our notification technology to ensure all alerts are sent properly so that you never miss another powder day.
We’ve updated our notification technology to ensure all alerts are sent properly so that you never miss another powder day.

Winter is in full swing across North America! We hope you are enjoying the powder!

 In this release:
- You can now upgrade to All-Access within the app
- Minor Bug Fixes

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com. We usually respond within one day (sometimes much sooner!).

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

We hope you’ve had a great 2016/17 season!

In this release:
- Time-lapse webcams (All-Access)
- Base Depth vs. Average graphs (All-Access)
- Fixed a few other odds and ends

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com. We usually respond within one day (sometimes much sooner!).

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

We're back with a fresh update for the 2017-2018 season! In this release:

- Daily Snow: Click to zoom images (finally!)
- Daily Snow: Clicking on links actually works
- All-Access: Restore a purchase made on a previous device
- Bunch of little improvements that you might not notice but make us feel good

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com. We usually respond within one day (sometimes much sooner!).

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

Various bug fixes and performance updates so that you're always ready for the next powder day!

- iPad Users: We haven't forgotten about you! Fixed a crash when sharing photos, mountains, or daily snows.
- Little improvements that you might not notice but make us feel good.

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

Optimized to make sure everything runs smoothly on iOS 11 and the new iPhone X.

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

Thanks for using OpenSnow! We’ve renamed the Base Depth graphics to Snowfall Analysis to clear up any confusion. 

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store.

Thanks for using OpenSnow! In this version...

• Home: We've made sure that after you upgrade to All-Access, the home screen refreshes.
• Image viewing: We fixed a minor bug where the app would crash when an image failed to load.
• More minor improvements and bug fixes that you might not notice but make us feel good.

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store.

Thanks for using OpenSnow! Free Users, we heard you loud and clear regarding the limit on favoriting mountains. This release allows for an unlimited amount of favorite mountains and Daily Snow forecasts!

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store.

Thanks for using OpenSnow! We fixed a bug that prevented you from seeing the full-sized version of the Snowfall Analysis graphics. Sorry about this!

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store.

Thanks for using OpenSnow! 

All-Access: We fixed a bug where some All-Access subscribers would incorrectly be shown as having a free account. Sorry about this!
Mountain Detail: We fixed a bug where large snowfall amounts would cut off.

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store.

Thanks for using OpenSnow! We made minor improvements and bug fixes that you might not notice but make us feel good.

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store.

Thanks for using OpenSnow! We made minor improvements and bug fixes that you might not notice but make us feel good.

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store.

We're back for the 2018-19 season with a completely redesigned OpenSnow experience! The update includes:

• Hourly Forecasts (US mountains only)
• Additional Data for 10-Day Forecasts
• Favorite & Compare Cams on your Favorites screen
• Compare Snowfall across Season Passes & Regions
• Map Comparison of Forecasts & Reports

The best parts of the previous design are still here, including Daily Analysis from our Local Forecasters, Custom Forecast & Report Alerts, and Timelapse Cams.

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

We’re on a quest to make things simpler and to provide even more value to our $19.99/year All-Access subscription. In doing so, we’re excited to share that we have combined all OpenSnow and OpenSummit accounts, including the All-Access subscription. 

One login and one subscription is all you need to see the All-Access features on BOTH OpenSnow and OpenSummit!

This update also includes:

• Improved functionality for checking and restoring All-Access purchases.
• Other minor improvements and bug fixes that you might not notice but make us feel good.

Learn more about our redesign: https://opsw.co/iOSUpdates

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

Thanks for using OpenSnow! This update includes:

• Refreshed headers and top navigation
• Weather advisories sorted by date

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

Thanks for using OpenSnow! We're back in 2020 with a fresh update that includes:

• Favorites screen redesign to more easily compare Mountains, Cams, and Passes
• Moved Daily Snow Forecasts to the bottom navigation
• Filter Daily Snow Forecasts by Region, State, Mountain, Travel, and more
• Moved News into the Explore screen
• Filter News by Learn, Media, Trip Reports, Guides, and more
• Trail Maps (Favorites > Trail Maps or Mountain > Trail Maps)
• Driving Directions (Mountain > Info)
• More behind-the-scenes improvements & bug fixes

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensnow.com

To learn more about these updates please visit https://opsw.co/iOS2020Updates

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you and let it snow!
